siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Are you lazy? Don’t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
blogPost.body: Are you lazy? Don’t have time for Linkedin? Meet Linvo. Linvo allows you to grow your network faster to achieve your goals more quickly. Instead of getting five connections every day and five messages. You get 80 connections every day and 80 messages.
blogPost.title: Linvo - Get more leads and sales on Linkedin
blogPost.author: Nevo David

localize.description: 你懒惰吗？没有时间玩LinkedIn吗？见见林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地扩展网络，从而更快地实现目标。而不是每天收到五个连接和五条消息。你每天都会收到80个连接和80条消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上获取更多线索和销售

localize.description: 你懶惰嗎？沒有時間玩LinkedIn嗎？見見林沃。Linvo使您可以更快地擴展網絡，從而更快地實現目標。而不是每天收到五個連接和五條消息。你每天都會收到80個連接和80條消息。
localize.tagline: 在LinkedIn上獲取更多線索和銷售

previous.excerpt: Rolley Scooterson is an award-winning intelligent electric scooter, easy-to-ride, energy-efficient, and fully controlled from your smartphone. With its AI-powered algorithms, Scooterson's app makes riding Rolley seamless and effortless.
previous.title: Rolley Scooterson - Intelligent electric scooter controlled from your smartphone

localize.description: 罗利滑板车是一款屡获殊荣的智能电动滑板车，易于驾驶，节能，完全可以通过智能手机进行控制。凭借其人工智能驱动的算法，斯库特森的应用程序使骑滚轮变得无缝和毫不费力。
localize.tagline: 智能手机控制的智能电动滑板车

localize.description: 羅利滑板車是一款屢獲殊榮的智能電動滑板車，易於駕駛，節能，完全可以通過智能手機進行控制。憑藉其人工智能驅動的算法，斯庫特森的應用程序使騎滾輪變得無縫和毫不費力。
localize.tagline: 智能手機控制的智能電動滑板車

next.excerpt: Clean and clear UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects. It’s the simplest way to work with buttons, charts, inputs, and popups with saving huge amount of time. Let your workflow become pleasant and trust such things to Deca UI Kit.
next.title: Free Deca UI Kit - Clean UI Kit with necessary stuff to create design projects

localize.description: 干净、清晰的UI工具包，包含创建设计项目所需的内容。这是使用按钮、图表、输入和弹出窗口的最简单方式，可以节省大量时间。让您的工作流程变得令人愉快，并将这些东西托付给Deca UI Kit。
localize.tagline: 干净的UI工具包，包含创建设计项目所需的内容

localize.description: 乾淨、清晰的UI工具包，包含創建設計項目所需的內容。這是使用按鈕、圖表、輸入和彈出窗口的最簡單方式，可以節省大量時間。讓您的工作流程變得令人愉快，並將這些東西託付給Deca UI Kit。
localize.tagline: 乾淨的UI工具包，包含創建設計項目所需的內容
